text: Benjamin Michael John Allison (born 18 December 1999) is an English cricketer. He made his first-class debut on 18 August 2019, for Gloucestershire in the 2019 County Championship, while on loan from Essex. He made his Twenty20 debut 20 September 2020, for Essex in the 2020 t20 Blast. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:English cricketers Category:Essex cricketers Category:Gloucestershire cricketers Category:Sportspeople from Colchester
title: Ben Allison (cricketer)
